TopicTitle: VAB Camera Focuses On Root Part When Deleting Parts

Articles.Content:
No mods.

I don't know what causes it to start happening, but quite often deleting any part will cause the camera to focus back onto the root part.  This is extremely frustrating when you're working on anything that's somewhat large.  And to be clear I don't mean a large number of parts.

The reason this is so frustrating is because the camera will often zoom to a location/angle that's far away from where it was before the part was deleted.  I then have to go find my place again.

Edit: This happens regardless of which part the camera is currently focused on.  But, I want to add this.  Even if I delete a part that is currently in focus, I never want the camera to go flying back to the root part.  It should just stay focused on where the part was.
